verbose_text: However, it has been observed that hyperhomocysteinemia may also impair endothelial function through a mechanism largely independent of the pathway of ADMA / DDAH, and without elevating ADMA, probably through the inhibition of endothelial nitric oxide synthase activity by protein kinase C or oxidative inactivation of NO, induced by dysregulation of renal cellular antioxidant enzymes [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: elevating ADMA, probably through the inhibition of endothelial nitric oxide synthase activity by protein kinase C or oxidative inactivation of NO
